nodes.text: Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide is a canon reference book written by Daniel Wallace that was released on November 13, 2018.

Recovered from a strong box on the Millennium Falcon, The Smuggler's Guide traces its own extraordinary journey through such notorious characters as Maz Kanata, Hondo Ohnaka, Dryden Vos, Lando Calrissian, and Han Solo. Explore previously unknown details about the underhanded dealings of the galaxy's underworld. What secrets will you discover in these storied pages?

Although initially slated for an October 30, 2018 release, the deluxe edition of Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide was pushed back to November 13, 2018. When asked the reason for the delay by a fan, author Daniel Wallace explained that it was due to logistical issues in international shipping, but that he expected the issue to be resolved soon.
